about_the_game:
Welcome to the deadliest bar in town, where every shot counts, and chaos is the main course. In 9mm Roulette, your fate is decided by the spin of a revolver barrel. With destructible environments, crazy physics, and tactical gameplay, this is no ordinary night out.

Take your turn: spin the barrel, shoot yourself to earn another move, or aim at your opponent to end theirs. Use the bar to your advantage—throw bottles, pin hands to tables with knives, or protect yourself with a bucket on your head. But be careful: every choice, every bullet, and every smashed bottle leaves its mark on the world around you.

In this mix of strategy, destruction, and dark humor, luck is your best friend, but quick thinking will keep you alive. So, what’ll it be—drink or fire? 💀

Key Features:
💥 Fully Destructible Environment:
Smash tables, shatter bottles, break windows, and even light up the bar—every action changes the battlefield.

🔫 Tactical Russian Roulette Gameplay:
Spin the barrel, choose your target, and embrace the thrill of unpredictable outcomes.

🎭 Ragdoll Physics Fun:
Control your hands to aim, grab objects, or dodge bullets. Lose a limb? Improvise with what’s left!

🪑 Crazy Bar Items:
Throw bottles to disorient opponents, pin hands to tables with knives, or wear a bucket for some last-second protection.

🎮 Chaotic Atmosphere with Dark Humor:
From NPC reactions to hilarious bar banter, every move brings a mix of tension and absurd fun.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above

  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
